## [vitae: Templates and tools for making a Résumé/CV](https://github.com/mitchelloharawild/vitae)

By [Mitchell O'Hara-Wild](https://github.com/mitchelloharawild/vitae)

**What is this?**

The *vitae* package makes creating and maintaining a Résumé or CV with R Markdown simple. It provides a collection of LaTeX and HTML templates, with helpful functions to add content to the documents.

1.  Repo link here: <https://github.com/mitchelloharawild/vitae>
2.  Templates are here: <https://github.com/mitchelloharawild/vitae#templates>
